title: InGame .5 - 1.5 sec lag slows, End of Game long load time, New Client
body: I would like this issue brought up and fixed for people like me who only used the old client before and didn't experience this for most of the game. This client needs more patch work and was rushed.

replies.body:
It's kind of hard to understand exactly what you mean by .5-1.5 sec lag slows, but it almost sounds like you're describing packet loss. Do me a favor and use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to check your most recent game logs, take a screenshot of what it says using something like Gyazo and post it here so we can look over it together. 

As for the end of game stat screen loading times, check your client options for something called "close client during game". Make sure that's **NOT** checked and you should see that after match lobby much quicker.
